comment: Lol I actually voted Syria. I don't trust Jews or Saudis and Iranians don't like Americans. I know Putin likes Assad. I've listened to Assad speak, he's quite Western and I find him believable.

# ::snt Lol I actually voted Syria. I don't trust Jews or Saudis and Iranians don't like Americans. I know Putin likes Assad. I've listened to Assad speak, he's quite Western and I find him believable.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (v / vote-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Syria"))
            :ARG1-of (a / actual-02)
            :mod (l / laugh-01
                  :mode expressive
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :manner (l2 / loud)))
      :snt2 (t / trust-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (d / dislike-01
                  :ARG0 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p / person
                              :mod (r / religious-group
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Jew")))
                        :op2 (p2 / person
                              :mod (c2 / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Saudi"
                                          :op2 "Arabia")))
                        :op3 (p3 / person
                              :mod (c3 / country
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Iran"))))
                  :ARG1 (p4 / person
                        :mod (c4 / country
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "America")))))
      :snt3 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (l3 / like-01
                  :ARG0 (p5 / person
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Putin"))
                  :ARG1 (p6 / person
                        :name (n7 / name
                              :op1 "Assad"))))
      :snt4 (a3 / and
            :op1 (l4 / listen-01
                  :ARG0 (ii4 / i)
                  :ARG1 (s / speak-01
                        :ARG0 p6)
                  :degree (q / quite))
            :op2 (f / find-02
                  :ARG0 ii4
                  :ARG1 (p7 / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (b / believe-01
                              :ARG1 p6)))))
